wo-123-impl.instruction: Implement the decomposition of the Household god class. Follow the REFINED technical specification in 'design/specs/TD-123_Household_Decomposition.md', specifically implementing the Adapter Pattern for AI compatibility and migrating all cloning logic to components.
wo-123-impl.title: WO-123: Household God Class Decomposition (Refined)

wo-124-impl.instruction: Implement the decomposition of the TransactionProcessor. Follow the REFINED 6-layer architecture in 'design/specs/TD-124_TransactionProcessor_Decomposition.md', including the CentralBank for minting and AccountingSystem for ledgers.
wo-124-impl.title: WO-124: TransactionProcessor God Class Decomposition (Refined)

td-123-spec.instruction: Draft a technical specification for TD-123: Decomposing the Household God Class into Bio/Social/Econ components, enforcing pure DTO usage.

td-124-spec.instruction: Draft a technical specification for TD-124: Decomposing the TransactionProcessor God Class into separate agencies (TaxAgency, SettlementSystem, Registry), enforcing zero-sum integrity.
